hero.headline: TURN YOUR DATA INTO DECISIONS - INTELLIGENTLY
hero.description: is a Saudi company specializing in AI automation systems that transform business operations and boost productivity by over 90%.

mission.title: Our Foundation
mission.subtitle: Guided by purpose, driven by innovation
mission.missionText: Is to empower enterprises across all sectors to achieve operational excellence through autonomous AI solutions that drive strategic automation and transform data into real-time intelligent decisions.
mission.visionText: Is to establish Ailigent as the world's leading partner for organizations driving sustainable digital transformation — powered by trusted, self-learning AI systems that work autonomously and deliver measurable performance impact.

tornix.title: Tornix
tornix.description: A powerful project management software with seamless integrations with popular platforms like Trello, Microsoft Project, and other commonly used enterprise tools, streamlining project workflows and collaboration.

pmoBuilder.title: PMO Builder
pmoBuilder.description: A comprehensive Project Management Office (PMO) reporting tool. Leveraging AI, it provides project managers with full monitoring capabilities throughout the project lifecycle, generating insightful reports and ensuring proactive oversight.

businessConsultation.title: Business Consultation & Customized Software
businessConsultation.description: We conduct in-depth analysis of a company's departments, identifying strengths and weaknesses. We then design and implement bespoke business automation and software solutions to address these specific challenges, optimizing processes and enhancing efficiency.

digitalTransformation.title: Digital Transformation
digitalTransformation.description: Accelerate your digital journey with innovation-driven strategies, modern technologies, and scalable business models. Our approach optimizes operations, enhances agility, and delivers superior customer-centric experiences.

aiDevelopment.title: AI Development
aiDevelopment.description: We provide cutting-edge AI development services in Saudi Arabia, building intelligent solutions that enhance automation, decision-making, and customer experiences.

agenticAI.title: Agentic AI Development
agenticAI.description: Empower your business with autonomous agents capable of complex problem-solving, advanced process automation, and intelligent decision-making.

generativeAI.title: Generative AI Development
generativeAI.description: Specializing in Generative AI in Saudi Arabia, we create solutions powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) for content generation, automation, and predictive analytics.

conversationalAI.title: Conversational AI
conversationalAI.description: We design sophisticated conversational AI solutions that deliver human-like interactions, automate customer communication, and significantly improve user experiences.

aiIntegration.title: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: Our AI integration services connect artificial intelligence with your existing ERP, CRM, and other enterprise systems.

pe.description: Delivering comprehensive full operation automation and custom software solutions for professional engineering firms, streamlining workflows and enhancing operational efficiency.
focus: Full Operation Automation & Custom Software Development
Custom software solutions tailored to engineering workflows

tornix.description: Tornix is an advanced AI-powered platform designed to transform project planning, execution, and delivery. Specializing in construction and large-scale projects, it integrates cutting-edge AI to bring automation, predictive analytics, and intelligent decision support.
focus: Automated risk detection and Monte Carlo simulations

consultation.title: Ready to Transform Your Operations?
consultation.subtitle: Schedule a strategic consultation with our enterprise automation experts. We'll analyze your current processes and design a custom AI solution that delivers measurable ROI.

assessment.title: Complimentary Assessment
assessment.description: Free analysis of your automation potential and ROI projections.

design.title: Custom Solution Design
design.description: Tailored automation architecture for your specific needs.

implementation.title: White-Glove Implementation
implementation.description: End-to-end support from design through deployment and beyond.
